chunks.zh: 是什么让你坚持在大年三十还上班/上 v 站的？
chunks.en: What makes you insist on going to work/browsing V2EX on Chinese New Year's Eve?

chunks.zh: 明天我还来.
chunks.en: I'll be here tomorrow too.

chunks.zh: 只要有时间，每天都来看看各位的表演😄
chunks.en: As long as I have time, I come to see everyone's performance every day 😄

chunks.zh: 能摸鱼，还不用带娃难得可以放松自己的日子
chunks.en: It's rare to be able to slack off and not have to take care of the kids, a day to relax.

chunks.zh: 运维值班啊 roll 到我这个倒霉蛋了
chunks.en: On-call for operations, got rolled to me, the unlucky one.

chunks.zh: 在做卤味，闲着没事溜达溜达。
chunks.en: Making braised food, wandering around when I have nothing to do.

chunks.zh: 穷
chunks.en: Poor

chunks.zh: 穷
chunks.en: Poor

chunks.zh: 为了年后能错峰放假🥹
chunks.en: To be able to take a staggered vacation after the New Year 🥹

chunks.zh: 海这边又不是节假日，早习惯了上 V 站？要不是这个问题我就潜水了😏
chunks.en: It's not a holiday on this side of the sea, I'm used to browsing V2EX already? If it weren't for this question, I'd be lurking 😏

chunks.zh: 没通知放假
chunks.en: No notice for holiday

chunks.zh: 身体好
chunks.en: Good health

chunks.zh: 当地不是节假日
chunks.en: It is not a holiday locally

chunks.zh: 当然是为了赶下午 1 点的组会报告，现在是除夕的凌晨 1 点
chunks.en: Of course, it's to catch the group meeting report at 1 p.m. It's 1 a.m. on Chinese New Year's Eve now

chunks.zh: 刚入职，本地过年，留守部门，给外地的同事提前走。中午前溜
chunks.en: Just joined the company, local New Year, staying in the department, letting colleagues from other places go early. Sneak away before noon.

chunks.zh: 放心，我明天初一还有班。
chunks.en: Don't worry, I still have to work on the first day of the New Year.

chunks.zh: 坚守最后一天
chunks.en: Holding on to the last day

chunks.zh: 穷，而且今天在家办公，可以摸鱼。
chunks.en: Poor, and working from home today, can slack off.

chunks.zh: 上 v 站是一种生活方式
chunks.en: Browsing V2EX is a way of life

chunks.zh: 穷
chunks.en: Poor

chunks.zh: 必然是穷
chunks.en: It must be poverty
